ygData.subject: Mining company?
ygData.msgSnippet: I need to go to the Mining co. in solusek a to get some deufrite or something like that. (cant remember exact name, am at work). Do I buy this? If  so, who is
ygData.messageBody:
I need to go to the Mining co. in solusek a to get some deufrite or something like that. (cant remember exact name, am at work). Do I buy this? If so, who is gonna sell it to an ogre SK? I am wondering about this part of the quest, anyone who has info to share on how to obtain this quest item please let me know. I have never walked in this dungeon, and dont see my ogre strolling through gnome time asking for it..
If i do not buy it, who do i kill to get it? I am level 30 btw..
Thanx

Morg
